at.xer0.x0_Library.Log

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.xer0.x0_Library.Log.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the ability to manage logging in your program. You not only have control over the different types of log-outputs but also if and what will be logged.
    Since:
    2015-07-12
    Author:
    Daniel 'Xer0' Englisch
